review.title: Un r\'esumeur \`a base de graphes, ind\'ep\'endant de la langue
review.abstract: In this paper we present REG, a graph-based approach for study a fundamental problem of Natural Language Processing (NLP): the automatic text summarization. The algorithm maps a document as a graph, then it computes the weight of their sentences. We have applied this approach to summarize documents in three languages.
